title: Account Link Search Message
description: Search for existing links with optional filter criteria
$comment: All fields are optional filters. Required items limited to a maximum of 100. If no filters are provided, returns all links belonging to the requesting participant.

linkType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalLinkedAccountTypeCode

linkStatus.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalStatusCode. If not provided, default is 6 (ATIVO)

participantOriginIdentification.description: Provides details about the origin participant and account identification

accountOriginIdentification.description: Provides details about the account identification

participantDestinationIdentification.description: Provides details about the destination participant and account identification

accountDestinationIdentification.description: Provides details about the account identification

managementGroup.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalFeeManagementGroupCode.

positionConsolidation.description: Enables position consolidation between linked accounts
positionConsolidation.$comment: Optional field. When true, positions will be consolidated across the linked accounts.

automaticAcceptance.description: Enables automatic approval of transfer requests
